alert.note: Alert for Pickens (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 14 at 4:27PM CDT by NWS Birmingham
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Pickens County through 500 PM CDT... At 427 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Reform, moving south at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Gordo, Reform, Carrollton, Owens, Kirk, North Pickens Airport, McShan, Lubbub and Shaw. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
